examples.example: 周末我和朋友们一起去体育馆打篮球，玩得非常开心。

translate.english: On the weekend, I go to the gymnasium to play basketball with my friends and have a great time.

examples.example: 我经常在体育馆里锻炼身体，感觉充满了活力。

translate.english: I often exercise in the gym and feel full of vitality.

examples.example: 每次走进体育馆，我都能感受到满满的运动热情和活力。

translate.english: Every time I walk into the gymnasium, I can feel full of sports enthusiasm and vitality.
